entry.def: Antacid is a substance that reduces the level of acid in the stomach.

means.word_mean: 1. an agent that counteracts or neutralizes acidity (especially in the stomach)
1. acting to neutralize acid (especially in the stomach)

auth_sentence.content: The saliva flow can lead to an antacid effect in the stomach.
